relation: PRETTY EASY IF YOU CAN STAY UP WITH YOUR WORK
TAKE YOUR TIME, USE ALL THE RESOURCES VENTURA COLLEGE OFFERS AND IF YOU DON'T KNOW ASK SOMEONE EVERYONE IS HAPPY TO HELP.
VENTURA COLLEGE IS AFFORDABLE. VENTURA COLLEGE OFFERS AN EASY WAY TO TRANSFER INTO A DEGREE. VENTURA COLLEGE IS A GREAT WAY TO GO FROM UNDECIDED TO MAJOR IN PROGRESS.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {159240=I am in my third semester of nursing school, I cannot wait to graduate in May as a Registered Nurse!!, 66440=the cafeteria unfortunatley will be dismessed as of summer semester 2012. but the good news is that food and all kinds of different resturants, grocery stores, etc are located around the school so you wont go hungry. and all are conviently less than 5mins away from the school, 217735=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I am learning a lot about the subjects I am taking and a lot about myself through them. Login to rate or flag the reviews Daniel from Ventura, CA 02/20/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 55 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great for those who want to save money, are unsure of their major or just want to stay in a great town! Tips for prospective students Have a good attitude, check in with a counselor twice a year to make sure you're on track. Take advantage of extra curricular activities. Bang for the buck Finishing up my second year here as probably saved me $60,000!!! Am enjoying being here I have grown a lot since high school by
